QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Outland!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Commander Duron in Hellfire Peninsula.$B$BThe expeditionary forces require your help to overcome the demonic armies of the Burning Legion! Talk to the Honor Hold Mage in the tall tower in the Mage District to travel to Blasted Lands, then walk through the Dark Portal to arrive at the Stair of Destiny.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription:
Report to Commander Duron at the Stair of Destiny in Hellfire Peninsula.
The Honor Hold Mage in the Mage District can help you get there.
